item.title: PINS
item.description: score:74 Chances: Pinterest, Inc. saw a significant share price rise of over 20% in the past couple of months on the NYSE TimesSquare Capital Management outperformed the Russell Midcap Growth Index in the third quarter Risks: The advertising industry outlook may affect smaller social media stocks Impulse purchases may not sustain, impacting Pinterest Score:74 chances characters count - risks characters count = -926
